SML Web Decoder

This website uses https://github.com/Apollon77/smartmeter-obis

Your data remains private. It's processed entirely within your browser and never sent to any server.
This tool allows you to test and analyze the data received from your SML smart meter locally.

The following chars are automatically removed: comma, whitespaces, 0x prefix and {}.
Try Testdata Hex 2 for examples.
